relation: configure terminal Example: Router# configure terminal
dial-peer voice number voip Example: Router(config)# dial-peer voice 1 voip
media flow-around Example: Router(config-dial-peer)# media flow-around
voice class sip early-offer forced Example: Router(config-dial-peer)# voice class sip early-offer forced
Enables privileged EXEC mode. Enter your password if prompted.
Enters dial peer voice configuration mode for the specified VoIP dial peer.
Forcefully sends SIP EO invites on the Out-Leg.
Exits dial peer voice configuration mode and returns to global configuration mode.
Exits global configuration mode and returns to privileged EXEC mode.
pageTitle: Cisco Unified Border Element Protocol-Independent Features and Setup Configuration Guide, Cisco IOS Release 12.4T - Support for Media Flow- Around with SIP Signaling control on CUBE [Support] - Cisco

textAfterTable: Configuring Delayed-Offer to Early-Offer Media Flow-Around for High-Density Transcoding Calls Perform this task to configure Delayed-Offer to Early-Offer Media transcoding high-density calls.
